Description:
Key Responsibilities:Product Knowledge:Develop a deep understanding of the pharmaceutical products, medications, and medical devices offered by the company.
Stay informed about industry trends, competitors, and the latest developments in healthcare.Customer Engagement:Identify and target healthcare professionals, including physicians, pharmacists, and hospital staff, as potential clients.
Build and maintain strong relationships with healthcare providers and decision-makers.
Arrange meetings and presentations to introduce products and discuss their benefits.Sales and Marketing:Develop and implement effective sales strategies and plans to meet or exceed sales goals and revenue targets.
Collaborate with the marketing team to create promotional materials and educational resources.
Attend medical conferences, seminars, and exhibitions to network and generate leads.Product Presentations:Conduct product presentations and demonstrations to healthcare professionals, highlighting the efficacy, safety, and clinical benefits of pharmaceutical products.Skills
Skills: 1) Should have more than 5 years experience in pharmaceuticals manufacturing.
2) Should have more than 5 years experience in pharmaceuticals marketing.
3) Should be familiar with pharmaceuticals in Saudi Arabia local market.
4) Should have connections with purchasing and operations departments in many pharmaceutical plants in Saudi Arabia.
